channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Intelligent Operations Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Intelligent Operations Center

item.title: CVE-2019-4069|2024-09-17T03:43:01.451Z -- ibm -- intelligent%20operations%20center
item.description: IBM Intelligent Operations Center (IOC) 5.1.0 through 5.2.0 does not properly validate file types, allowing an attacker to upload malicious content. IBM X-Force ID: 157014.

item.title: CVE-2019-4420|2024-09-17T00:35:38.348Z -- ibm -- intelligent%20operations%20center
item.description: IBM Intelligent Operations Center V5.1.0 through V5.2.0 could disclose detailed error messages, revealing sensitive information that could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 162738.

item.title: CVE-2019-4070|2024-09-17T02:42:24.869Z -- ibm -- intelligent%20operations%20center
item.description: IBM Intelligent Operations Center (IOC) 5.1.0 through 5.2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 157015.

item.title: CVE-2019-4066|2024-09-17T03:12:30.507Z -- ibm -- intelligent%20operations%20center
item.description: IBM Intelligent Operations Center (IOC) 5.1.0 through 5.2.0 could allow an authenciated user to create arbitrary users which could cause ID management issues and result in code execution. IBM X-Force ID: 157011.
